title: Bir Küçük Gün Işığı
overview: The series is about the story of Elif, who has to start all over again after coming out of the dark to the light of day. Elif's life, who has been living in a lie for 10 years, turns upside down with the news she receives. Everything becomes more complicated when the path of the helpless young woman unexpectedly crosses with the wealthy businessman Fırat.
